title: Candemonium
summary: A game I made for a Texas Aggie Game Developers jam. All you have to do is dodge the candies!
long_summary: A game I made for a Texas Aggie Game Developers jam. All you have to do is dodge the candies! It's a very simple game made in Adobe Flash, back when that was still something people did.

gallery.alt: A cute star avoiding candy corn coming down straight lines toward it.
gallery.caption: Beware the mighty candy corn

gallery.alt: A cute star avoiding an assortment of candy coming at it in circular waves.
gallery.caption: Each level has a unique pattern
